title: Braum Art
body:
Another art:

http://m.imgur.com/oNwICms

Im DC>LoL sorry guys...
Wont be drawing League of Legends art as much now.

replies.body:
woahkay. his eyes, they stare into my soouuullll.

His face blends to much with the background.

apart from that, hes great! (Though lee sin is my favorite for you so far :))
It's tbh a little weird to see my manly man in chibi art.
